^(has_latest_tag)$.description:
Indicates if the image has the latest tag. The image being checked
 might not explicitly have the latest tag, but it could also be tagged
 with the latest tag.

^(signature_digest)$.description: Digest of the found signature for the image

^(signature_provider)$.description: The provider in charge of the signature

hasLatestTag.description:
Indicates if the image has the latest tag. The image being checked
 might not explicitly have the latest tag, but it could also be tagged
 with the latest tag.

signature.description: Base64 encoded signature payload, aka the OCI Signature Manifest

signatureDigest.description: Digest of the found signature for the image

signatureProvider.description: The provider in charge of the signature
